ComicInfo.Summary:
SDF-1 faces a deadly attack... from Earth! The dramatic conclusion to the first arc of Year Two in the radical Robotech reimagining! Simon Furman (Transformers) and Hendry Prasetya (Mighty Morphin' Power Rangers) bring new life to the classic anime, in an ongoing series perfect for fans old and new!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Nick Roche | 1 | B | Action Figure Cover B (Lynn Kyle - Robotech Defense Force) | Blair Shedd | 2 | C | Cover C | Marc Laming | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-12 07:03:29. [CVDB697535]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Blair Shedd, Marc Laming, Nick Roche
